metadata.dc:author: Hindi Muñiz, Nadia
Lamarca Lete, Angela
Feliú Batlle, Jaime
metadata.dc:description: Up to 5% of all diagnosed colorectal cancers has a hereditary cuase. Colon cancer arise in younger individuals, and extracolonic tumors are also frequent. A precise understanding of main syndromes will allow the proper management of these patients, including genetic counselling, screening and prophylactic surgery.
metadata.dc:title: Cáncer de colon hereditario.
[Hereditary colorectal cancer].
